name: Vedica Organics
overview:
Vedica Organics is an online organic food store, based in New Jersey.

Our Organically Certified products help create and sustain livelihood for farmers The choices we make, not only improve our quality of food, but also impact the quality of life for many. We believe in sourcing from small farm-holdings in India, the majority of which are still untouched by toxic outputs. This enables micro-management and organic certification practices, where farmers can produce sustainably and deliver contaminant-free food to consumers. Thus, a buyer of Vedica Organics partners in encouraging production, helping create a livelihood for farmers and return to a more sustainable way of life. Our USDA certified products include:

• An aromatic variety of Rice: From old favourites such as Basmati Rice to the uniquely selected Biryani Pulav Rice • Stone milled fine Flour: From Wheat Chakki Atta to Multigrain to gluten-free flours such as Ragi and Besan • Vast range of hearty, classic Indian Dals: Channa Dal, Urad Dal and Chickpea Kabuli Dollar • Fine selection of crackling Pappadums from India including Moong Garlic Papadum • Fruity delectable Chutneys: Apple Walnut Chutney and Apricot Ginger Chutney • Prepared Indian Classics: Punjabi Rajma, Sambhar and Kadhi • Healthy Organic Pastas made the organic way: From Fusilli to Farfalle • Organic, solar dried and aromatic spices: From Cumin Seeds and Turmeric to specialty spice blends such as Thai Flavor Seasoning • Rejuvenating Teas and Coffees such as CTC Indian Tea and Smooth Instant Coffee
